Model Class¶

class Model.Model(rho, mu, r_min, r_max, rr, dr, n, l, method, mtype)¶

Model objects are created from the users inputs to store and pass specifications for the computation of mode frequencies. These objects hold model parameters, mode parameters, and the integration method.

__init__(rho, mu, r_min, r_max, rr, dr, n, l, method, mtype)¶
Parameters

  • rho (1D array) – Density values from input model.

  • mu (1D array) – Shear modulus values computed from model data.

  • r_min (float) – Minimum radius of elastic body.

  • r_max (float) – Maximum radius of elastic body.

  • dr (1D array) – Radial step between data points. May be an array of constants or a varying array.

  • rr (1D array) – Radial data values from input model.

  • n (int or 1D array) – Radial order values to compute mode frequencies for.

  • l (int or 1D array) – Angular order values to compute mode frequencies for.

  • mtype (string) – Type of mode to compute. Currently computes “toroidal”.

  • method (string) – Integration method for compuation. Currently supports Euler (“euler”), 2nd-order Adams-Bashforth (“ab2”) or 4th-order Runge-Kutta (“rk4”).

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
